metadata.title: CVE-2019-20933 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: InfluxDB before 1.7.6 has an authentication bypass vulnerability in theauthenticate function in services/httpd/handler.go because a JWT token mayhave an empty SharedSecret (aka shared secret).

criterions.comment: influxdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
